Description_lang: Clear your mind and attune yourself with the Heart of Azeroth, $?a137020[causing Frostbolt and Flurry to generate an additional Icicle]?a137019[increasing your Fire Blast recharge rate by ${$303399s1*-2}%][increasing your $@spelldesc304633 generation rate by $s1%]$?a298377[ and ][]$?a137020&a298377[increases ][]$?a298377[your Leech by $298268s6][] for $d.
AuraDescription_lang: $?a303412[Frostbolt and Flurry will generate an additional Icicle]?a303399[Fire Blast recharge rate increased by ${$303399s1*-2}%][$@spelldesc304633 generation increased by $s1%].$?$w2>0[Leech increased by $w2.][]

description_blz.en_US: Clear your mind and attune yourself with the Heart of Azeroth, increasing your Mana generation rate by 100% for 12 sec.
description_blz.es_MX: Despejas la mente y te armonizas con el Corazón de Azeroth, lo que aumenta tu generación de Maná un 100% durante 12 s.
description_blz.pt_BR: Limpa a sua mente e harmoniza você com o Coração de Azeroth, aumentando a taxa de geração de Mana em 100% por 12 s.
description_blz.de_DE: Macht Euren Geist frei und stimmt Euch auf das Herz von Azeroth ein. Dadurch erzeugt Ihr 100% mehr Mana. Hält 12 Sek. lang an.
description_blz.en_GB: Clear your mind and attune yourself with the Heart of Azeroth, increasing your Mana generation rate by 100% for 12 sec.
description_blz.es_ES: Despejas tu mente y te armonizas con el Corazón de Azeroth, lo que aumenta tu índice de generación de Mana un 100% durante 12 s.
description_blz.fr_FR: Vous videz votre esprit et entrez en harmonie avec le Cœur d’Azeroth, ce qui augmente la vitesse de génération de la ressource (Mana) de 100% pendant 12 s.
description_blz.it_IT: Libera la mente e la sintonizza con il Cuore di Azeroth, aumentando la velocità di generazione della risorsa Mana del 100% per 12 s.
description_blz.ru_RU: Вы очищаете сознание и настраиваетесь на Сердце Азерот, в результате чего скорость накопления ресурса (мана) повышается на 100%. Время действия – 12 сек.
description_blz.ko_KR: 정신을 가다듬고 아제로스의 심장에 자신을 조율합니다. 12초 동안 마나 생성 속도가 100%만큼 증가합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 清除你的雜念，與艾澤拉斯之心同調，使你的法力恢復速度提高100%，持續12秒。
description_blz.zh_CN: 摒除杂念，让自己与艾泽拉斯之心相协调，法力值的回复速度提高100%，持续12秒。
